mapper.select: SELECT Machine_Name as machineName, Machine_Signal as machineSignal, PartsCount_Result as cncProducts, ifnull(Override_Rapid,'0')as cncRapidFeed, ifnull(Override_Spindle,'0')as cncSrate, (SELECT SYSDATE()) as currentTime, Alarm_Message as cncAlarm, Machine_Mode as cncMode, MainProgram_No as cncMainProname, Tool_No as cnc_toolnum, Spindle_Mode as spindleMode FROM Monitoring_List WHERE Machine_Name=#{name}
